TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DateTimeFormatterBuilder extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Builder to create date-time formatters.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Time.Format.DateTimeFormatterBuilder AppendInstant() cil managed

Docs.summary: Appends an instant using ISO-8601 to the formatter, formatting fractional digits in groups of three.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Time.Format.DateTimeFormatterBuilder AppendInstant(int32 fractionalDigits) cil managed

Docs.param: the number of fractional second digits to format with, from 0 to 9, or -1 to use as many digits as necessary
Docs.summary: Appends an instant using ISO-8601 to the formatter with control over the number of fractional digits.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: the pattern to use, not null
the text to use when the offset is zero, not null

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Time.Format.DateTimeFormatterBuilder AppendZoneId() cil managed

Docs.summary: Appends the time-zone ID, such as 'Europe/Paris' or '+02:00', to the formatter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Time.Format.DateTimeFormatterBuilder AppendZoneOrOffsetId() cil managed

Docs.summary: Appends the time-zone ID, such as 'Europe/Paris' or '+02:00', to the formatter, using the best available zone ID.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Time.Format.DateTimeFormatterBuilder AppendZoneRegionId() cil managed

Docs.summary: Appends the time-zone region ID, such as 'Europe/Paris', to the formatter, rejecting the zone ID if it is a ZoneOffset.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
